nodes.long_description:
Welcome to Med Valley! 

Med Valley is designed to empower medical students with unlimited access to practice their clinical skills, anytime, anywhere and PASS their OSCE exams. 

You will be transported into a virtual hospital with virtual patients crafted to deliver an authentic and immersive experience. We have dozens of scenarios with more being added every month.

Our personalized automated score tracking system will capture and analyze your performance. Focus solely on your training and use the provided feedback to identify areas of strength and areas for needed improvement. All within one simplified learning tool.

Are you ready to embark on this revolutionary journey towards medical excellence and PASS your OSCE exams? Prepare to be captivated, enlightened, and transformed with Med Valley!
nodes.short_description:
Welcome to Med Valley! 

Med Valley is designed to empower medical students with unlimited access to practice their clinical skills, anytime, anywhere and PASS their OSCE exams. 

You will be transported into a virtual hospital with virtual patients crafted to deliver an authentic and immersive experience. We have dozens of scenarios with more being added every month.

Prepare to be captivated, enlightened, and transformed with Med Valley!

nodes.long_description:
SimTec MD is the future home of the Medical Metaverse and is building the VR clinics that will train the next generation of medical professionals. This allows health professionals to put on a headset and practice clinical skills on virtual patients. 

Ever wondered if you could be a doctor? Come and see. Practice clinical skills including histories, physical exams, and clinical procedures. 

Track your results over time so you can focus your training and prepare for clinical exams like the OSCE if you are a medical student.
nodes.short_description:
Ever wondered if you could be a doctor? SimTec MD is building the VR clinics that will train the next generation of medical professionals. 

Practice clinical skills including histories, physical exams, and clinical procedures.

nodes.change_log:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Current release - May 1th:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

V3.2.8
- Major bug fixes: two-handed interactions are now easier to do and your hands no longer get "stuck" to the patient
- New Gastrointestinal Cases: two new pathological physical exam Abdominal Pain cases added to Gastro.

* MedValleyVR.com *
- New website: remember to visit our new website at MedValleyVR.com for exclusive content and to help us grow!

—------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Previous releases changelog:
—------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

V 3.2.5
- Multiplayer mode: have your friends join you as you play through cases. Invite them in the people app!
- New Respiratory cases: two new pathological physical exam Shortness of Breath cases added to Respiratory.

V 3.1.19

-Player Level now live!
Practice in My Clinic to level up your clinical skills

-Pathological Physical Exams now have Reporting Findings
Practice your reporting, diagnostic, and case management skills with this new feature

V 3.1.14
-My Clinic now open:
Personalized training area where you can practice all available cases in a customized order to optimize your learning experience.
-New Start Menu:
Start menu has been updated and includes many new features, including a fast travel map to different locations in the VOSCE hall.
-Expanded Explainers:
Neuro exams (ULN, LLN, and Cerebellar) now have explainers on all interactions.

V2.7.6
- The Musculoskeletal room now no longer has empty scenarios.

V2.7.5
-Expansion of “Fever” Case Group in Core ED:
Fever Hx (updated)
Fever and Malaise Hx (new)
Fever and Anosmia Hx (new)
-Expanded Explainers
Knee [short] Px and GALS Px have explainers on all interactions

V2.7.2
-Expansion of “Murmur” Case Group:
Fatigue & SOB
Fatigue & Bloating
-Issue under investigation: Some interactions are buggy following instrumented interactions (e.g. auscultation with the stethoscope).

V2.7.1
-New Case Group: Murmur
Chest Pain and SOB Px
Chest Pain and Dizziness Px
Chest Discomfort Px
-New anterior lung auscultation sites improved.

v2.6.1
-Exams added:
Variant of Hx Sore Throat for patient Robin
Variant of Hx Sore Throat for the patient Bala
- New Feature:
Improved interactable patient mesh. Posterior chest interactions should now be easier and more realistic!

v2.5.5
-Exams added:
Abdominal Pain Px
Shoulder Pain Hx
-New Feature:
Case groups: VOSCEs will now be grouped; Foundational Groups are available and Pathological groups will be coming soon.
- Fixed: Navigation between maps, Tutorial and main map functionals.

v2.5.4 Minor code fixes

v2.5.3
-Exams added:
Primary Survey Px
Shortness of Breath Px.
Features:
Vitals monitor which includes a thermometer, an oximeter and a blood pressure monitor.
Fixes:
As we are continuously working in fixing bugs, from the past week the Facial animations in Hx are back and the animations "Close eyes" and "Open mouth" are working again, these appeared when we improved our metahumans, new characters coming soon, so please be patient!
Known issues:
Chronic cough Hx facial animations are a work in progress.

v2.5.2
- Exams added:
Hx Chronic Cough.
Px Cerebellar.
Px Upper Limb Neurological today is functional.
Px Pathological murmur.
- New unique interactions:
Apex Beat in Cardio Px.
Knee reflex.
- Features:
Reflex Hammer functionality improved.
Voice Command Menu improved.
Several aesthetical props added, some of them will be functional later on.
Custom audios and haptics for the new pathological scenarios.
- Known issues:
Door lock bug between levels tentatively fixed.
Facial animations in Hx are still a work in progress.

v2.5.1 Minor code fixes

v2.5.0 Minor code fixes

v2.4.9
-Several code fixes, the more noticeable are:
Hammer reflex bugs improved.
Hammer reflex now requires adding some speed to work.
The Chest Pain Hx room is in the corresponding scenario.

v2.4.8
- Exams added:
Upper Limb Neurological Px (Blackboard and score pending).
Chest Pain Hx added, Includes a new patient!
- Features: Hammer reflex functional.
Loading screen.
- Known issues: Some bugs related with the new functional reflex hammer and the animations if you perform those on the opposite side asked to the patient.
The Metahumans still have their mouths closed when they talk in the History rooms, we are working on that bug and will be fixed in the next release (Sept 1st).
- Coming Soon: We are working hard to add some basic Pathologies for the following release!

—------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Current release - March 29th:
—------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

V 3.2.5
- Multiplayer mode: have your friends join you as you play through cases. Invite them in the people app!
- New Respiratory cases: two new pathological physical exam Shortness of Breath cases added to Respiratory.
- New website: remember to visit our new website at MedValleyVR.com for exclusive content and to help us grow!
